text: Dual effects of LPS antibodies on cellular uptake of LPS and LPS - induced proinflammatory functions .

Human phagocytes recognize bacterial LPS ( endotoxin ) through membrane <extra_id_0> CD14 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( <extra_id_0> mCD14 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) , a proinflammatory LPS receptor .
This study tested the hypothesis that anti-LPS Abs neutralize endotoxin by blocking cellular uptake through <extra_id_0> mCD14 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .

Ab - associated changes in the uptake and cellular distribution of FITC-LPS were assessed by flow cytometry and laser scanning confocal microscopy in human <extra_id_0> CD14 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - transfected Chinese hamster ovary fibroblasts ( CHO - <extra_id_0> CD14 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> cells ) and human peripheral blood monocytes .
LPS core - and O-side chain - specific mAbs inhibited <extra_id_0> mCD14 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - mediated LPS uptake by both cell types in the presence of serum .

O-side chain - specific mAb concurrently enhanced complement - dependent LPS uptake by monocytes through <extra_id_0> complement receptor-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( <extra_id_0> CR1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) and uptake by CHO - <extra_id_0> CD14 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> cells involving another heat-labile serum factor ( s ) and cell - associated recognition molecule ( s ) .

Core - specific mAb inhibited <extra_id_0> mCD14 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - mediated uptake of homologous and heterologous LPS , while producing less concurrent enhancement of non - <extra_id_0> mCD14 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - mediated LPS uptake .

The modulation by anti-LPS mAbs of <extra_id_0> mCD14 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - mediated LPS uptake was associated with inhibition of LPS - induced nuclear factor-kappaB ( NF-kappaB ) translocation and <extra_id_0> TNF-alpha <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> secretion in CHO - <extra_id_0> CD14 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> cells and monocytes , respectively , while mAb enhancement of non - <extra_id_0> mCD14 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - mediated LPS uptake stimulated these activities .

text: LPS - specific Abs thus mediate anti-inflammatory and proinflammatory functions , respectively , by preventing target cell uptake of LPS through <extra_id_0> mCD14 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and augmenting uptake through <extra_id_0> CR1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> or other cell receptors .
